body_html: The documentation for the function calls out that if the memory_layer is None, the memory should assume the shape of the query_layer and vice-versa. However the code ever evaluates what happens when both memory and query layers are not specified.
body_text: The documentation for the function calls out that if the memory_layer is None, the memory should assume the shape of the query_layer and vice-versa.  However the code ever evaluates what happens when both memory and query layers are not specified.
body: The documentation for the function calls out that if the `memory_layer` is None, the memory should assume the shape of the `query_layer` and vice-versa.  However the code ever evaluates what happens when both memory and query layers are not specified.
